mapper.select: select name,comm_cd_func('lecCategoryCd',lec_category_cd) as lec_category_cd,credit,subj_name,eval_status_cd,lec_cd from lec_manage a, syllabus b, lec c, prof d where a.subj_cd=b.subj_cd and b.syl_cd=c.lec_cd and c.stu_cd=#{stuCd} and b.prof_id=d.prof_cd and c.lec_cd in (select lec_cd from lec where stu_cd=#{stuCd} and mylec_status_cd='s') order by lec_cd

select l.lec_cd, nvl((select col_name from college where col_cd = (select college_cd from major where major_cd=lm.major_cd)),' ') as col_name, nvl((select major_name from major where major_cd=lm.major_cd),' ') as major_name, nvl((select comm_cd_name from comm_cd where comm_cd_gr='geCd' and comm_cd_val=lm.ge_cd),' ') as ge_cd, (select comm_cd_name from comm_cd where comm_cd_gr='targetGrade' and comm_cd_val = target_grade) as target_grade, S.max_stu_num, L.stu_num, S.lec_date_1, nvl(S.lec_date_2,' ') as lec_date_2, S.classroom, credit, subj_name, (select name from prof where prof_cd=S.prof_id) as prof_name from syllabus S, lec_open L,lec_manage lm, lec le where S.syl_cd = L.lec_cd and lm.subj_cd=S.subj_cd and L.lec_cd = le.lec_cd and le.stu_cd = #{stuCd} and le.mylec_status_cd = 's' and le.GRADE_SEME_CD = #{gradeSemeCd} order by cdate asc
select stu_cd from lec where lec_cd = #{lecCd} and mylec_status_cd = 's'
mapper.delete: delete from lec where stu_cd = #{stuCd} and lec_cd = #{lecCd} and grade_seme_cd = #{gradeSemeCd}
mapper.select: select c.name,lec_date_1,lec_date_2,b.subj_cd,email_addr,lec_cd,(select subj_name from lec_manage where subj_cd=b.subj_cd) as subj_name,classroom,ano_cd, comm_cd_func('lecCategoryCd',d.lec_category_cd) as lec_category_cd, MAX_STU_NUM,lec_hour,credit,comm_cd_func('geCd',ge_cd) as ge_cd from lec a,syllabus b,prof c, lec_manage d where b.syl_cd=a.lec_cd and b.prof_id=c.prof_cd and d.subj_cd=b.subj_cd and stu_cd=#{stuCd} and seme_cd=#{semeCd} and mylec_status_cd='s'
select lec_cd from lec where stu_cd=#{stuCd} and grade_seme_cd=(select '0'||grade||'0'||stu_semester from student where stu_cd=#{stuCd}) order by lec_cd

select * from (select lec_notice_no,lec_cd,(select subj_name from lec_manage where subj_cd=(select subj_cd from syllabus where syl_cd=lec_cd)) as subj_name,cdate,content,title,view_cnt,ano_cd from lec_notice where lec_cd=#{lecCd} order by cdate desc) where rownum in (1,2)
select ev_item_no, content, comm_cd_func('evalQueCd',eval_que_cd)as eval_que_cd, eval_que_cd as origin_eval_cd from lec_eval_items order by ev_item_no
